thread.title_full: Kayla Itsines Bikini Body Guide Workout Discount Site reviewed by Lexie Coulson

title: Lexie Coulson
text: I purchased the Bundle BBG 1.0, 2.0 and H.E.L.P e-book, all of which were immediately sent to my inbox. As someone who has been looking at BBG for awhile, I was glad to wait for this discount and was impressed with the results.
